entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
